title:
The storm drains on Chestnut Street near Snipes School have been deliberately blocked so water can\'t enter them.  (Water collects nearby on the street as a result, when it rains.)

Why was this done and by whom?  Will they be reopened?

(It\'s been this way for a very long time, maybe a year..)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6845
